channel.title: Uhhh how to change stat bonuses?...POST & READ
channel.description: Ok i have almost all the good items in silabs client and all he stats are 0 and i want to change the stat bonuses. How do i do this? Also. How do i set it where you can have 85 def 85 mage and 90 range for the 3rd age armor? POST! thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2007, 09:00:23 PM[/size][hr]1 more thing how do i change what the emote tabs say?

item.title: Uhhh how to change stat bonuses?...POST & READ
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

A list of frames are added at the bottom of the post.
You have to change them by searching for

update();

And adding this format underneath it…

sendFrame126("TEXT", #);

Read full topic

item.description:
@hippie wrote:

case numbers for emotes. dont ask me what they are i do not know, try serching sendframe(126)

for the bonuses, go to item.cfg, and add the items to it.dont ask me what they are, im to lazy myself to add to the CFG
